about_the_game:
Game Introduction:
This is a VR game called "VR Basketball Sweetie", which is a training game for all shooting lovers. By utilizing the game features of VR, players can ignore the limitations of training venues and spaces, and practice shooting anytime, anywhere.



Gameplay:
The gameplay of the game is very simple, you only need to wear a VR helmet and handle, and you can enter a completely virtual basketball court. Here, you can choose different shooting positions and angles, and then challenge your shooting skills. In the simulator you can use real basketball shooting skills.
We have prepared a variety of difficulties to satisfy shooting enthusiasts of different levels. Beginners can choose a lower level of difficulty to gradually become familiar with shooting skills, while experienced masters can choose to challenge higher levels of difficulty to improve their shooting skills. In the game, the player needs to invest more times than the sparring robot arm within the specified time in order to win.



In addition to the mechanical arm, the game also prepares the experience of playing with beautiful women. The beauties will cheer for the players in the background, encouraging them to achieve better results in the game. This interactive game experience can not only improve the player's shooting skills, but also allow the player to feel the immersive game atmosphere.



This is a very fun and challenging game. It can not only help you improve your basketball skills, but also allow you to experience the real feeling of shooting in the virtual reality world. It is a game worth trying. The difficulty setting in the game and the company of beautiful women can also make players feel a real challenge and sense of accomplishment in the game. Come and try it!

game operatio

The left handle roulette controls the movement of characters
The right handle trigger button generates a basketball
Swing the right handle and release the trigger button to complete the shooting action
